description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Take on the role of a hero fighting for your home land. Battle in the earth's depths through the armies, traps and mysteries of the dark wizard's keep. From the developers of Miner Dig Deep comes an exciting adventure RPG which can be enjoyed solo or couch co-op.
description.short: Take on the role of a hero fighting for your home land. Battle in the earth's depths through the armies, traps and mysteries of the dark wizard's keep. From the developers of Miner Dig Deep comes an exciting adventure RPG which can be enjoyed solo or couch co-op.
